articles.title: mRNA decoding in human is kinetically and structurally distinct from bacteria - Nature.com
articles.description: The reaction coordinate of aminoacyl-tRNA movement is altered on the human ribosome and the process is an order of magnitude slower compared with bacteria due to eukaryote-specific structural elements in the human ribosome and in the elongation factor eEF1A.
articles.content:
Buffers and reagents
